Republicans are hoping to regain House and possibly the Senate in the upcoming midterm elections, and incumbents tend to hold major advantages over their electoral challengers.
author: Kevin Breuninger
title: GOP Rep. Cawthorn calls leaked nude video blackmail,' says he was just being crass with a friend'

sentence: Dumbest MF in DC Madison Cawthorn has been implicated in a potential insider trading scheme, and now likely violated House ethics rules with staff pay.
author: Scott Anderson
title: Kagro in the Morning podcast (AUDIO): Friday, May 6, 2022

sentence: Saul Loeb/Pool via REUTERS/File Photo WASHINGTON, May 5 (Reuters) - A grainy 28-second video showing a naked young man gyrating against someone in bed amid squeals and laughter was the latest in a string of episodes that has turned Republicans against one of their own: the brash U.S. Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina.
author: David Morgan
title: Nude video latest scandal turning Republicans against U.S. Rep. Cawthorn
